mapper.select: SELECT CM.MENU_ID, CM.MENU_NAME, CM.MENU_LEVEL, CM.DISPLAY_ORDER, RU.START_DT FROM CM_USER CU , CM_ROLE_USER RU , CM_ROLE CR , CM_ROLE_MENU RM , CM_MENU CM WHERE CU.USER_ID = RU.USER_ID AND RU.ROLE_ID = CR.ROLE_ID AND CR.ROLE_ID = RM.ROLE_ID AND RM.MENU_ID = CM.MENU_ID AND CU.DELETE_YN= 'N' AND CR.USE_YN = 'N' AND CM.MENU_TYPE= 'VIEW' AND CU.USER_ID = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN RU.START_DT AND RU.END_DT ORDER BY CM.MENU_LEVEL ASC, CM.DISPLAY_ORDER ASC, CM.MENU_ID ASC
